sentences: Filmil on keerulised ja detailikad osad.
context: The word 'osad' is the nominative plural form of Estonian word 'osa', which means part, share, portion or component. It refers to multiple parts or pieces that make up a whole. This could be used in various contexts like describing parts of a machine, shares of something, portions of food, or components of a system. The dictionary definition also shows it can refer to elements or aspects related to performance roles or work assignments.
